definition: the reason why
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
correct/right/so/thus/like this/-ly
to know that it is so but not why it is so (idiom)
pinyin: zhi1 qi2 ran2 er2 bu4 zhi1 qi2 suo3 yi3 ran2
containing_words.word: 知其然而不知其所以然

sentences.english: Do not ask why, just take it as given that there is unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 不問所以然，只是把失業的存在作爲前定條件。

sentences.english: We grasped small monster petticoat detailed increase to cross-examine, can certainly ask a why.
sentences.chinese: 咱們抓了小妖女詳加拷問，定能問出個所以然來。

sentences.english: Asked two elderly, Road no- whys and wherefores.
sentences.chinese: 問兩位老人，也道不出個所以然來。

sentences.english: I would argue that it does, but I would never get anywhere with that.
sentences.chinese: 我想要同她爭辯說有，但卻從來也說不出個所以然。

sentences.english: I am not going to go further I am not going to try to explain why.
sentences.chinese: 至於爲何所以然的問題我不想做進一步的解釋。

sentences.english: I learned very early the difference between knowing the name of something and knowing something.
sentences.chinese: 我很早就明白知其然和知其所以然的區別。

sentences.english: Lesson Three: By and large, "knowing how" matters more than "knowing what.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，知其所以然比知其然重要得多。

definition: outline/main threads
(coll.) a long time
to turn over in one's mind (idiom); to think through from different angles/to ponder
to fail to grasp the main points
to hem and haw/to stall/to stammer/to mumble/to falter
to resist/to deal with
to respond evasively or vaguely/to elude/to stall
to search one's guts and belly (idiom); to racks one's brains for a solution
to consider from all angles (idiom); to think hard/to rack one's brains
deceitful trick/mystery/unfathomable
to figure out/to work out (a solution etc)/to think up/to come up with (an idea etc)
to equivocate/to talk evasively (idiom)
to keep silent (idiom)
to muddle through/to fob sb off/to beat around the bush/to dodge
agape and tongue-tied (idiom); at a loss for words/gaping and speechless
see 百思不解[bai3 si1 bu4 jie3]
pinyin: bai3 si1 bu4 de2 qi2 jie3

definition: lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
